trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma célula individuais num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewCell representa uma célula individuais num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter células através da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: A linha e coluna de uma célula DataGridViewCell é identificam a localização da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula típica contém dados específicos a linha e coluna na qual está contido.

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A célula pode ser personalizada de diversas formas, definir as respetivas propriedades e processar os eventos associados à mesma.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>atribuído para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar a instância devolvida por este método, substitua o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>está atualmente atribuído ao controlo, é criada uma nova instância de um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a secção "Active Directory acessibilidade" biblioteca do MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>atribuído para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Modifica o estilo do limite de célula de entrada, de acordo com os critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo internamente chama o método de AdjustCellBorderStyle para determinar o aspecto dos limites da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo normalmente utiliza o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>propriedade para o `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>valor não é suportado como um estilo de entrada de células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo do limite de célula para modificar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que é utilizado para armazenar alterações intermédias para o estilo do limite de célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar um limite vertical à célula; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para adicionar um limite horizontal à célula; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula de alojamento está a ser a primeira coluna visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula de alojamento está a ser a primeira linha visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A modificação <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa as larguras de todos os as margens da célula.

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: A largura predefinida do limite de célula é um pixel.

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valores para modificar a largura do limite: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valor indica uma largura de 0 pixels.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>valores aumentam a largura predefinida, 1 pixel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>propriedade está definida para a linha da célula de proprietário, altura do retângulo é aumentada pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>propriedade está definida para a coluna da célula de proprietário, será possível aumentar a largura do retângulo pelo valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que vão ser calculada para as margens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa as larguras de todos os as margens da célula.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será sem quando a célula é clicada.

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de ClickUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing linha da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados transmitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha será sem, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A base de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata esta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de Clone sempre que deriva da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>classe e adicione novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de coluna para esta célula.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna para a linha que contém os cabeçalhos de linha tem um valor de -1.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna que contém a célula; -1 se a célula não está contida dentro de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador que encloses área conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo devolvido relatórios coordenadas de cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>método para obter o respetivo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Para a base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>o tipo, este valor é <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o retângulo delimitador de célula em vez do conteúdo da célula, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>propriedade é inferior a 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será sem quando clica no conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The ContentClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de ContentClickUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing linha da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados transmitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho associado a célula.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade indica o menu de atalho que é geralmente apresentado quando o utilizador right-clicks célula.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`, obter o valor da gera de propriedade ContextMenuStrip é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos do controlo e devolve o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade como de eventos especificado processador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma processadores para o evento, obter o valor da propriedade ContextMenuStrip é devolve o valor especificado anteriormente ou o valor predefinido de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento é principalmente útil ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades no desempenho quando definir a célula valor ContextMenuStrip é para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: A alteração desta propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>evento o proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se existir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Também pode especificar menus de atalho para as linhas individuais em vez de células individuais, definindo a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade ou processamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell ContextMenuStrip property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A definição da propriedade ContextMenuStrip é célula substitui a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>definição de propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>substituições de eventos de ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>eventos e a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>definição de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar `null` para um célula menu de atalho, no entanto, para impedir que um menu de atalho da linha que está a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associados a célula.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value for a cell in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor predefinido para uma célula na linha de novos registos.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultNewRowValue property in the base class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DefaultNewRowValue na classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>sempre devolve `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: However, this property can be overridden in derived cell classes to return other default values.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, esta propriedade pode ser substituída nas classes derivadas de célula para devolver os outros valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is displayed if the cell is in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: O valor devolvido por esta propriedade é apresentado se a célula na linha de novos registos.

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName> event when focus enters the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode ser substituído por um processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>Quando foco introduz a linha para novos registos de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the default value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor predefinido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove a célula da edição controla a partir de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> calls this method when the current cell hosts an editing control and editing mode ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>chama este método quando a célula actual aloja um controlo de edição e extremidades do modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>, and then removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>e, em seguida, remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This cell is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta célula não está associada a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> has a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>propriedade associada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> tem um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl*>

trans-unit.source: This is the case, for example, when the control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: É este o caso, por exemplo, quando o controlo não está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula é atualmente apresentada no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether a particular cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar se uma célula específica foi off-screen deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A> property value is `false`, this property will return `false` as well.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>valor da propriedade é `false`, esta propriedade irá devolver `false` bem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está no ecrã ou parcialmente no ecrã; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será sem quando a célula faz duplo clique.

trans-unit.source: The DoubleClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de DoubleClickUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing linha da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> containing the data passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados transmitidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha será sem, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A base de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor atual, formatado da célula, independentemente se a célula está no modo de edição e o valor não foi consolidado.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor atual da célula ou editar controlo se a célula está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, obter o valor desta propriedade converte o valor de célula para um valor de apresentação equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Isto gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento, o que pode processar para personalizar a conversão do valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se não for bem-sucedida, a formatação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma rotina de tratamento para este evento ou os conjuntos de processador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, é emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual, formatado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>é inferior a 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formatação falha e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo ou definir o processador do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de exceção, normalmente, pode ser convertido no tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo de edição alojada da célula.

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade para devolver o tipo de controlo de edição dele alojada sobrepõe-se um tipo derivado de célula.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an editing control, as with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, the EditType property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula não tiver um controlo de edição, tal como com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, devolve de propriedade EditType `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl"> </xref> tipo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha de principal estará sem quando move o foco para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The EnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de EnterUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha que contém a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, deverá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma ação do utilizador movido foco à célula; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se uma operação programática mover o foco para a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha será sem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A base de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> classe sempre devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites de ícone de erro para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo devolvido relatórios coordenadas de cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `false`, o valor desta propriedade é <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A> method to get its value.

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Para a base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>tipo, este valor é sempre <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites de ícone de erro para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que descreve uma condição de erro associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a propriedade ErrorText é utilizada ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>evento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da célula falhar alguns critérios de validação, defina a propriedade de ErrorText e cancelar a operação de consolidação definindo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: O texto que especifique, em seguida, é apresentado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, e é pedido ao utilizador para corrigir o erro nos dados da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>é `true`, pode fornecer o texto de erro para linhas e células utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando atribui uma cadeia diferente de ErrorText para uma célula, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: A partir do .NET Framework 4.5.2, redimensionamento do ícone de erro é determinado pela definição PPP sistema quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto que descreve uma condição de erro associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza os recursos não geridos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> é reclamada a recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>método com `false` como parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula como formatado para apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade é o objeto de dados real contido célula, enquanto o FormattedValue é a representação formatada deste objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados destes valores, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter o valor desta propriedade chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>método para converter o valor de célula para um valor de apresentação equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Isto gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento, o que pode processar para personalizar a conversão do valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se não for bem-sucedida, a formatação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma rotina de tratamento para este evento ou os conjuntos de processador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, é emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor formatado da célula ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a célula não pertence a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>é inferior a 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a célula for uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control or the handler set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Formatação falha e o mesmo não é nenhuma rotina de tratamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo ou definir o processador do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException*>

trans-unit.target: O objeto de exceção, normalmente, pode ser convertido no tipo <xref:System.FormatException>.</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado associado a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade é o objeto de dados real contido célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>propriedade é a representação com formatação dos dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>e FormattedValueType propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados destes valores, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de célula do formatado valor.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula está fixa.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Frozen depende o estado da linha de principal da célula e a coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `Frozen` propriedade de linha ou coluna está definida como `true`, também é propriedade de Frozen a célula `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está fixa; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado da célula para copiar para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para obter um valor formatado da área de transferência que representa o valor da célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor da célula é obtido pela primeira vez no formato de apresentação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>eventos para formatar o valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>eventos se formatação for concluído com êxito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros relacionados com a posição deste método indicam onde esta célula está localizada na tabela de dados que representa a região definida pelas células selecionadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo da posição da célula, informações de formatação adicionais podem ser devolvidas por este método, juntamente com o valor da célula formatado para apresentação.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o formato HTML para uma célula na primeira coluna de uma linha incluirá a etiqueta que indica o início de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os formatos de área de transferência suportados incluem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula é a última coluna da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula está a ser a primeira linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula está a ser a última linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area using a default <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style currently in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses área conteúdo da célula utilizando uma predefinição <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e estilo atualmente em vigor para a célula da célula.

trans-unit.target: O tamanho do conteúdo da célula é calculado dinamicamente quando este método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation always returns <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de classe base sempre devolve <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The specified rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: Especificado rowIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current value of the editing cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o valor da célula da edição atual ou editar controlo se a célula está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, este método converte o valor da célula um valor de apresentação equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Isto gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>evento, o que pode processar para personalizar a conversão do valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma rotina de tratamento para este evento ou os conjuntos de processador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, é emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas que este método de substituição, normalmente, irão devolver uma representação de cadeia de valor de célula se o `context` argumento inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula como formatado para apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo chama este método para converter um valor de célula para um valor de apresentação equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O controlo transmite o valor de célula para este método de `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event can modify both the `value` and `cellStyle` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Um processador para este evento pode modificar tanto as `value` e `cellStyle` parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: If the handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object.
trans-unit.target: Se o processador não definido o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, no entanto, este método formatos `value` utilizando as propriedades de formatação do `cellStyle` objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not convert `value` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value for values equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este método não converter `value` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valores iguais ao valor da propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor de propriedade quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>está definido para um valor diferente de <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>ou `null`.</xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to display the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>o evento a apresentar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o exemplo de código <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se não for bem-sucedida, a formatação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError>

trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma rotina de tratamento para este evento ou os conjuntos de processador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`, é emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> em vigor para a célula.
